page.title: 17HOME LIFE/ATTITUDES
page.content: Most families in our survey live in private houses,ranging from living on farms to detatched and semi_detatched houses on the new estates.Most houses are brick built except the older ones which are wood and plaster. We found out that 20 families have moved into Dunmow recently because of a new job, although the new job was rarely in Dunmow.The recent extension to the M11 the M25 has meant that London and other large towns are more accessible. Most people find Dunmow a friendly enviroment to live in but they do not think the shopping facilities are adequate,so families go to Braintree Harlow and Bishop's Stortford for some of their shopping.Every family has a phone and a garden.Many families have labour saving equipment in their homes Many people are worried about the changes when Stansted Airport develops
